oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Group Inspecting a Model of the Capitol Hill Redevelopment Project, 1954
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of a group of men inspecting a model of the Capitol Hill Redevelopment Project in the lobby of City Hall. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority, November 1954. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
